R 1200              1200

NO ./path_to_the_north_texture.xpm
SO ./path_to_the_south_texture
WE ./path_to_the_west_texture
EA ./path_to_the_east_texture

S ./path_to_the_sprite_texture

F 220,100,12
C 225,30,12
